Subject: Ancient rivalry-Optimus

--part1_24.1087c0c1.27a9dbbd_boundary
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

 Magnus lunged at Galvatron. His sword penetrated into the evil bots stomach. 
"Now your mine!"
 Galvattron gurled up mech fluid. He pulled up his hand and shot a energy 
beam right threw Magnus's chest. Right through his spark. Magnus fell back. 
The matrix had kept him from death. Galvatron looked over him. He used his 
tail and dug into the bots back. Crushing his support device(spine). He was 
completly paralyzed. Galvatron looked at him. "Now you are finished. My hands 
will flow with the blood of the righteous." He clawed his way through the 
bots chest plate. Exposeing the matrix of peace. Galvatron luched his hand 
into the spark. Pulling in out. As he did Magnus said one final word. As his 
eyes widened with horror he screamed.... "OPTIMUS!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!"
 Galvatron  put the spark with his collection. Magnus's body lay lifless. The 
final merge would now begin.

--part1_24.1087c0c1.27a9dbbd_boundary
